statements: SELECT * FROM payments ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, amount, currency FROM payments WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT payment_method, status FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM payments;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT payment_id, amount, currency FROM payments WHERE currency = 'USD' AND status = 'completed'
SELECT payment_id, payment_method, status FROM payments WHERE payment_method IN ('Credit Card', 'PayPal') AND status NOT LIKE '%pending%'
SELECT payment_id, amount, transaction_date FROM payments WHERE status = 'failed' ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT payment_id, gateway_response FROM payments WHERE gateway_response ->> 'response' = 'approved'
SELECT * FROM payment_gateways;
SELECT gateway_name, integration_key FROM payment_gateways ORDER BY gateway_name DESC;
SELECT gateway_id, gateway_name, is_active FROM payment_gateways WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_date, status FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT gateway_name, integration_key, is_active FROM payment_gateways;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions WHERE status = 'success';
SELECT gateway_name, is_active FROM payment_gateways ORDER BY gateway_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_gateways;
SELECT gateway_name, gateway_url FROM payment_gateways WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT gateway_name, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM payment_gateways JOIN transactions ON payment_gateways.id = transactions.gateway_id GROUP BY gateway_name;
SELECT gateway_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payment_gateways JOIN transactions ON payment_gateways.id = transactions.gateway_id GROUP BY gateway_name ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_gateways ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT gateway_name, api_key FROM payment_gateways WHERE gateway_name = 'Stripe';
SELECT gateway_name, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM payment_gateways JOIN transactions ON payment_gateways.id = transactions.gateway_id GROUP BY gateway_name HAVING total_transactions > 10;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2021-01-01' AND transaction_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sender_id, recipient_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM fund_transfers GROUP BY sender_id, recipient_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, user_id, amount FROM payments WHERE payment_status='success';
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE phone_number='123-456-7890';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT gateway_name, gateway_url FROM payment_gateways WHERE gateway_mode='live';
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_status = 'success';
SELECT user_id, amount FROM payments WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT gateway_id, gateway_name, gateway_mode FROM payment_gateways WHERE gateway_mode = 'live';
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM users WHERE name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT method_name, card_number FROM payment_methods WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT gateway_name, api_key FROM payment_gateways;
SELECT transfer_id, from_account, to_account, amount FROM fund_transfers WHERE transfer_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM payment_gateways WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT gateway_name, api_key FROM payment_gateways ORDER BY gateway_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transfer_id, to_account, amount FROM fund_transfers WHERE amount > 10000;
